Audio.Comments: Distance to mic. 15m. Natural atypical song. First four song phrases normal, 5th and 7th phrases with one atypical ‘flat’ note, then mixed numbers of typical and atypical notes from 8th to 16th (last) phrases.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
